تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Dear Anthony, 

Further to your email, you will find below our reply : 

 

For the Civil Liability, Brazil is not covered by an integrated  contract  because it is a "Stand Alone" policy. 

 

You must contact the local Insurer directly, in this case AIG Brazil.

 

Please make the necessary the soonest to be able to renew the previous policy with effect 01/01/2025 and keep all posted. 

 

Let us have also the renwal Y 2025 for the Motor Insurance. 

 

I look forward to hearing back from you 

 

Thank you and all the best 

 

Joe Nasr

Dear Joe,

 

At the end of last week we receive response from Mapfre declining the risk. They had accepted the risk and had schedules a survey of the location, but then they refused the risk alleging that the conditions of the building did not meet their risk acceptance guidelines. We have gone back to Mapfre and asked them if there is any improvement or correction that could be made for them to reconsider.

 

Thank you,

 

Anthony Wyles
Diretor Comercial

Dear All,  

 

I remind you concerning the renewals of the policies of  Christofle Brazilia LTDA    

 

1.	For the vehicle , premium form 18 Nov 2022 to 18 Nov 2023; it has been paid ? Reminder 

The premium is being paid in four installments, we can see the first two have paid and the next are due on the 18th of January and 18th of February.

 

2.	GL/ AIG  , we note renewal has been shared with AIG and waiting documentation

Please find enclosed the policy for your file.

 

3.	For Property/ Allianz  we will wait  Fev the 25th  2023  we will wait 

        Nº Itens: 1 Vigência das 24h de 25/02/2022 às 24h de 25/02/2023

         OK 

 

We look forward to hearing back from you,

All the best

pient, please destroy this e-mail and notify the sender immediately - you should not retain, copy, distribute or use this e-mail for any purpose, nor disclose any of its contents to any other person. Any views expressed in this message are those of the individual sender, except where the sender specifically states them to be the views of Nasco.
Data protection statement
In order to provide you with products and services we need to collect, use, share and store personal and financial information about you. This includes the information requested from you and information obtained from third parties. The information requested may be used to assist us in providing the service you are applying for, to advise you of other products and services, to confirm, update and enhance records and to establish your identity. The data that we collect may be shared / transferred to / or stored / or processed at, our offices in countries outside our jurisdiction.
Bank Details are confidential information and Nasco will never send generic emails informing you of any change to its bank account details or requesting you to make transfers to a different account. The information we collect on clients’ bank details, is collected when onboarding the client, and must be provided on signed letterhead of the client. We follow the same process to notify our clients of our bank details. Should you receive any request via email to take note of a change to our bank details or requesting you to transfer any funds to a different account, you must not respond to the email and must contact your Nasco contact by phone immediately to alert them of this request.
